metadata.title: CVE-2022-28331 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: On Windows, Apache Portable Runtime 1.7.0 and earlier may write beyond theend of a stack based buffer in apr_socket_sendv(). This is a result ofinteger overflow.

criterions.comment: apr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
